rooms.name: Living Room and Lounge
rooms.description: Art Deco inspired living space with accent lighting, geometric patterns, and floor-to-ceiling windows to enhance natural light. Includes wheelchair accessible design with open layout and ramps.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, designed in Art Deco style with elegant decor and wide doors. Wheelchair accessible pathways.
rooms.vastu_alignment: North facing for auspicious dining area

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern Art Deco kitchen integrated with living space, equipped with wheelchair accessible counters and sinks. Floor-to-ceiling windows for abundant natural light.
rooms.vastu_alignment: North-east for positive energy in food preparation

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious, decorated with Art Deco motifs and ample window space. Accessible design features include wide doorways and lowered fixtures.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom with Art Deco accents. Wheelchair friendly, with easy access to the garden view.
rooms.vastu_alignment: North or east to encourage restfulness

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: En-suite bathroom designed for accessibility with grab bars and wheelchair maneuverable design. Floor-to-ceiling windows provide natural light.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Stately Art Deco door with wheelchair accessible ramp. West-facing entrance aligning with plot orientation.

openings.name: Service Entrance
openings.description: Secondary access for service and emergency use, designed to be easily navigable for wheelchairs.

garden.dimensions: Approximately 10x30 feet along the east and south sides of the plot
garden.description: Designed with native plants, seating areas and wheelchair accessible pathways to allow for relaxation and interaction with nature.
